thread.title: You Deserve To Get Dumped If You Send One Of These Trump Valentines
thread.title_full: You Deserve To Get Dumped If You Send One Of These Trump Valentines

author: Brittany Wong
title: You Deserve To Get Dumped If You Send One Of These Trump Valentines
text:
You Deserve To Get Dumped If You Send One Of These Trump Valentines Make Valentine’s Day terrible again. 02/07/2017 05:32 pm ET Brittany Wong Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
Have yuuuge desire to sleep on the couch this Valentine’s Day? We’ve got you covered. 
Imgur user TKFN4212817 recently uploaded a bigly batch of Donald Trump -themed Valentine’s Day cards onto the site. They’re about as unromantic as valentines get: TKFN4212817/Imgur 
This one definitely won’t make Valentine’s Day great again: TKFN4212817/Imgur 
The Imgur user who made the cards is a professional graphic designer who chose to remain anonymous. 
“I just made them for shits and giggles, to be honest,” he told The Huffington Post. “I wanted to create some really dumb, cheesy and very poorly written Trump Valentine’s Day cards to make myself laugh and let it loose on the Internet.” 
And hey, maybe even end a few relationships in the process. TKFN4212817/Imgur
